alert.note: Alert for Henry; Putnam (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 01 at 6:58PM EDT until June 01 at 7:45PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN PUTNAM AND SOUTHEASTERN HENRY COUNTIES... At 657 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Leipsic, or 9 miles north of Ottawa, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Ottawa, Leipsic, Deshler, Holgate, Glandorf, Hamler, Malinta, West Leipsic, Gilboa, Belmore, Miller City, New Bavaria, Prentiss, Gallup and Elery. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Northern Indiana.
